message.body: Bro, if you're serious about that, we should book a couple days 4 u 2 come up to MTL & play on her record! It'll be during the 1st half of Jan.g..
Cool, i should be able to come the first or third weekend
1st please!!! We'll finish tracking by the 11th.
Cool, are you back in burly town? We should chat bout it
Yeah man! I'm free 6-8 today, if yer around... Or tomorrow evening... Leaving on sat or sun.
Tomorrow evening would be better, are you at gregs place? I can stop by there at 6ish
No, but I'm always close. Text me 1st! Hasta manana, hermano!
